text.title: Australian rules football: Interview with Andy Thissling, statistician for the Traralgon Football Club senior side

head.s: Thissling , statistician for the Traralgon Football Club senior side

p.s: Wikinews contributor Patrick Gillett interviewed Andy Thissling of the Traralgon Football Club .
Andy is the statistician for the Gippsland Football League clubs senior side , or first XVIII .

The
Gippsland Football League
( officially Gippsland League , GL ) is the only major
Australian rules football
competition in the Gippsland region according to the Victorian Country Football League .

:
Can you describe what you do at Traraglon footy club ?
On match day , I do the stats for the Traralgon Football Club , for the seniors .
And I love it so much .
I want to have this job for ever .

hi.s: How Long have you been doing this ?

p.s: What do you meen mate ?
How long have I been doing the stats for ?
I 've been doing it since 2004 .
I got asked to do it and since then , I 've been doing since 2004 to today 's date .

hi.hi: How often do you talk to the coach and provide him with the stats ?

p.s: Each quarter I go to the coaching staff and get them all my stats to them and tell it to them what 's what .
An the I do them at the end of the quarter .
And then at the end of the game I 'll hand them my stats .

caption.s: A South Australian store is pictured here

hi.hi: What is your job out side of football ?

p.s: My job outside of football is , I work at a supermarket called Coles Supermarket in Traralgon .
I work there three days a week .
That keeps me out of mischief for a few days .
Yeah mate , that 's like us .

caption.s: Traralgon won the 2009 minor premiership , equivalent to the premiership in association football , but failed to win the premiership , equivalent to the championship

hi.hi: Does working at Coles effect your involvement with the footy club ?

p.s: Not really .
It 's just three days of work and that 's all .
The rest I 'll stay home do some house work and get ready for footy on Saturdays .
Goes like lightning during the week .

hi.s: Will Traralgon win the minor premiership this year , like they did last year ?

p.s: We take one game at a time and that 's all .
Footy 's a funny old sport mate .

hi.hi: Damn straight it is , Good to hear .

p.s: Yeah that 's right mate .

hi.hi: Has there ever been a point when you 've wanted to give up doing the stats ?

p.s: No.
I just like to do it and if I want a break it give someone else a go and tell then the action .

hi.s: Final question - do you want to add anything for readers ?

p.s: Thanks for you time Pat and keep up the good work mate .
